questions.question: 2. How can an I ask questions here?
questions.Answer: The link on your profile page will lead you to either the answering page or the questions page based on whether you are an instructor or a student respectively.

questions.question: 3. When can someone ask or reply to questions here?
questions.Answer: As soon as we are taught how to do this in class using javaScript.

questions.question: 4. How do I submit a Question?
questions.Answer: Just type the question out in the space below.

questions.Answer: Yes, this is the first Question i Have added from a JSON file
